pageContext.geocode_address: White Plains Recreation & Parks, 85 Gedney Way, White Plains, NY 10601, USA
pageContext.public_note: **Please be advised, if you are signing up for both AM & PM sessions of camp during the week there is no coverage from 12-1pm. The child/children will have to be picked up and brought back for the PM session.**
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Master the world of Ninjago by becoming a Ninjaneer!  Hone your Spinjitzu battle skills, travel on the Destiny's Bounty, and face Lord Garmadon!  In this advanced camp, Ninjaneering masters will learn real world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture while exploring the fantasy world of Ninjago.
